message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond this price point, but I'm open to discussing a fair deal.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but my budget allows me to pay no more than $8,000 for it. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $8,000 is significantly below its true value. I could consider letting it go for $11,000. This is my final offer.

Hello Alice, thank you for your response. While I understand the value of the product, I am unable to meet your asking price of $11,000. I would like to propose an offer of $9,500. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle.
